event.title: BarRoom Preachers & C&S Rollin’ Smoke!
event.description: On June 22, we will have live music featuring BarRoom Preachers and delicious BBQ by C&S Rollin’ Smoke! Cheers!

event.title: June Jeep Meet
event.description: OlllllllO We love seeing those Jeeps! Next meet will be June 30th 2-6pm. Let’s talk Jeeps over cold craft beer! We also have wine, cider, & mimosas. Cheers!

event.title: Paws and Pints
event.description: Join us at Vallensons for our first fundraiser to Help Us, Help Them, Wag Again. There will be great food from Home Saddled BBQ, amazing beer (of course) from the brewmaster himself Valle, live music, raffles, and of course, doggos!

event.title: July Jeep Meet
event.description: OlllllllO July Jeep Meet will be July 21st, 2-6pm. Food truck is TBD. Show us your Jeeps! Cheers!
